title: "The Man Behind One of The Most Important AI Advancements, AlphaFold"
excerpt: "In July 2021, a London-based subsidiary of Alphabet, DeepMind, delivered the revolutionary answer to the decades-long ‘ protein-folding problem ’ in the history of AI research: AlphaFold. The open-source AlphaFold can accurately predict 3D models of protein structures from 1D amino acid sequences,"
